Package com.intellij.ide.projectView

Interface ProjectViewNodeDecorator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCoverageProjectViewNodeDecorator, CompoundProjectViewNodeDecorator

    public interface ProjectViewNodeDecorator
    Allows to modify the presentation of project view and package dependencies view nodes.
    See Also:
    TreeStructureProvider

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ExtensionPointName<ProjectViewNodeDecorator> EP_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decorate(PackageDependenciesNode node, ColoredTreeCellRenderer cellRenderer)
      Modifies the presentation of a package dependencies view node.
      void decorate(ProjectViewNode node, PresentationData data)
      Modifies the presentation of a project view node.

    • Field Detail

      • EP_NAME

        static final ExtensionPointName<ProjectViewNodeDecorator> EP_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • decorate

        void decorate(ProjectViewNode node,
              PresentationData data)
        Modifies the presentation of a project view node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to modify (use AbstractTreeNode.getValue() to get the object represented by the node).
        data - the current presentation of the node, which you can modify as necessary.

      • decorate

        void decorate(PackageDependenciesNode node,
              ColoredTreeCellRenderer cellRenderer)
        Modifies the presentation of a package dependencies view node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to modify.
        cellRenderer - the current renderer for the node, which you can modify as necessary.
